Package fr.Adrien1106.util.protocol

Interface ServerProtocol

public interface ServerProtocol
Defines the methods that the scrabble Server should support. The results should be returned to the client.
Author:
Adrien1106

  • Method Details

    • doConnect

      String doConnect​(String player_name) throws InvalidNameException
      Called when new connection is established
      Returns:
      a feedback message to confirm the connection
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException

    • doJoinRoom

      String doJoinRoom​(String room_id) throws UnknownRoomException, RoomFullException
      Called when a player request to join a room
      Parameters:
      room_id -
      Returns:
      an initialization of the room (table, players that are already in the game);
      Throws:
      UnknownRoomException
      RoomFullException

    • doCreateRoom

      String doCreateRoom​(String player_number) throws TooManyPlayersException, TooFewPlayersException
      Called when a new room is being created
      Returns:
      a room id that the person just created
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException
      TooFewPlayersException

    • start

      String start()
      Called when a game starts
      Returns:
      the table info, player_list with their associated numbers

    • doMove

      Parameters:
      alignment -
      coordinates -
      word -
      Returns:
      if move has been accepted
      Throws:
      NotOwnedTileException

      Called when a player want to skip his turn

    • doReplaceTiles

      String doReplaceTiles​(String tiles) throws UnknownTileException
      Called when a player want to replace some tiles
      Parameters:
      tiles - - tiles to be replaced
      Returns:
      new tiles to be sent to the client
      Throws:
      UnknownTileException
